name: Aeons Past
description:
Aeons Past

The first game by Frostwater Media, Aeons Past is a short, 5-8 hour, fantasy RPG.

Intuitive Exploration!

Be sure to poke around every corner and crevasse, you never know what you could find to give your party the upper hand!


Dynamic Combat!

Use powerful spells and abilities to control the flow of combat, and customize your skills to best suite your playstyle!



Influence your party through dialogue choices!

Different dialogue effects how your party reacts! Make sure you say the right things if you want them to like you!





Activate Powerful Armor Set Bonuses!

Loot, buy and earn different sets of armor to equip the best set for your character and build!




A world that shows not tells!

As much as I like waiting through 15 minute scenes at the beginning of a game, sometimes I like to get straight to the action! With Aeons Past, the gameplay starts almost as soon as you press play!
